QuestData.Title: This Land is Ours
QuestData.Description:
The plague unleashed during the war has tainted the land and disturbed the dead. That is to say, more so than they already were.
We have worked hard to rebuild, but our people cannot complete their efforts while under threat.
My first duty is to ensure the safety of the Forsaken. I will meet with the others as Calia requests, but first you must help me eradicate some of these Blighted.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Blighted Soldiers in Tirisfal Glades.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Dark Ranger Velonara in the Brill Inn.
